sc.About:
StarLight Academy is a premiere science institute which believes in quality education for all. From basic structure of cell to astonishing diversity among living organisms, from ray of light to production of electricity, from structure of carbon compounds to mole concepts, we cover each topic in the most interactive way possible.
Chapter-wise assignments, regular tests, periodic PTMs are our fortay.

Study smarter. Shine brighter.

mat.About:
Mathematics offered by StarLight Academy is a boon for the students who want to get the best out of this subject. It not only integrates with biology but also with physics and chemistry. It is a subject of vast applications and thus requires explanation by well-experienced professionals. We, at StarLight Academy, offer you the education wherein instead of mugging, we will do complete justice to mathematics.

Study smarter. Shine brighter.

ph.About:
Physics is a phenomenal science which deals with the order in the universe. It uses mathematics to provide solutions to various questions regarding logic, planetary motions and even floral patterns. We, at StarLight Academy, share about all the possible explanations for these natural phenomena using physics.

Study smarter. Shine brighter.

ch.About:
Have you ever wondered how our body resist change in pH even if we eat/drink something acidic? Why is it that some chemicals produce a characteristic aroma? How are the biomolecules like DNA/RNA formed? How is petrol/diesel produced industrially?
Answers to all these questions lie in the foundation of chemistry. We would love to answer the changes in the chemistry of our surroundings.
See you soon!

Study smarter. Shine brighter.

bi.About:
Curious to know about what happens inside your body everyday? How our immune system protects us from deadly microbes? What is the reason behind variations in your generation and the previous ones?
Well, you are at the right place. We have answers to all your queries. Join us in this journey and get ready to explore BIOLOGY!

In addition to the classroom courses, we also offer correspondence course in Biology wherein study material, assignments, solved test papers are delivered at your doorstep. The validity of the correspondence course is same as that of classroom's.

Looking forward to your participation.

Study smarter. Shine brighter.

mat.About:
Mathematics offered by StarLight Academy is a boon for the students who want to get the best out of this subject. It not only integrates with biology but also with physics and chemistry. It is a subject of vast applications and thus requires explanation by well-experienced professionals. Study smarter. Shine brighter.
